alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Crawfordville to 13 miles northwest of Carrabelle. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Alligator Point, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Panacea, Owens Bridge, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Buckhorn and Spring Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
